description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS file, and the main App component. It initializes the React DOM root and renders the App component within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the application, identified by the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the React element into the root, encapsulating the App within React.StrictMode.
